name: Offroad 4x4 car driving Mountain
description:
Take control of 9 cars and 2 motorbikes in a huge forest and mountain environment : 16 km² area, 30 km of roads !
Accomplish a lot of variety of missions to become a good driver.

!! Offroad 4x4 car driving Mountain contains 20 levels !!

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
The system of missions is based on GTA like game : drive on the map and find one of the 20 spots to launch a mission.
The minimap help you to know where are the missions spots.

The map is very huge, and contains a lot of point of interest.
Like a cascade and a lake, a japanese temple, a small airport, different houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
The road system are also very dense, from 2x2 lanes, to very small road of montains, with hill climb.

Example of missions :
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Drive quickly without hitting the boars
- Emergency intervention and rescue the victims
- Follow your friends trought the forest with your 4X4 and SUV
- Use your truck to remove all the objects present on the road
- Catch all the gangsters before they escape
- Finish the course as fast as possible

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains and forests
- Realistic driving simulator
- Realistic physics
- High quality 4x4 vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.
